card.name: Billing - Duplicate values on pastel file

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @sameerkumandan1 

Please ask George to explain exactly what it is he changed on this company's Invoice Details recently.

George mentioned that he added "Purchase Orders" for this client recently via Client Central.
George must explain what a "Purchase Order" is and how he adds it to the system step by step so that we can investigate what causes the issue.
